title: letter_to_west
abstract:
August 14, 2007
Mr. Peter Warwick, President & CEO
Thomson North American Legal
610 Opperman Drive
St. Paul, Minnesota
 
Via Facsimile: 1-651-687-1979
Dear Mr. Warwick:
I am writing to you today for your guidance.  My organization, the nonproﬁt Public.Resource.Org, in con-
junction with a number of other nonproﬁt corporations and universities, have set ourselves a goal of 
creating an unencumbered public repository of all federal and state case law and codes.  This goal is not 
meant to compete
